Bio

"Men of few words are the best men." - William Shakespeare, Henry V

I'm Gurpreet Singh <gsinghbox@gmail.com>, a programmer, student, and a scientist.

I currently live in New York. I study Computer Science at The City College of New York (CCNY). I will graduate in June 2016.

I like to play chess (not very good), read about world history, and watch anime and sports (cricket, soccer, etc.). Ronaldo over messi, and Tendulkar over any sportsmen. I also like rap music, and the Legendary Eminem is my favorite artist.

ok, bye.
